name: Pagupoidea
description:
Paguroidea is a 2D side scroller, platformer and puzzle game where you control a tribe of Hermit Crabs.

Explore the depth of the ocean and lead your Hermit Crabs to the end of this journey.

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2019 with the theme "What home means to you"

Credits :
